original: 廣漢綿竹人。師同郡楊厚學圖讖，究極其術。與董扶齊名，秦宓評二人：「董扶褒秋毫之善，貶纖介之惡。任安記人之善，忘人之過」
text: People from Guanghan Mianzhu. Under the tutelage of Yang Hou from the same prefecture, he studied the divinity and studied extremely skill. As famous as Dong Fu, Qin Mi commented on the two:  'Dong Fu praises the goodness of autumn and derogates the evil. Ren An remembers the goodness of people and forgets the faults of others.'
